mapper.insert: INSERT INTO personal_todo (id, user_id, title, content, target_date, is_completed) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{targetDate}, false)
mapper.update: UPDATE personal_todo SET title = #{request.title}, content = #{request.content}, target_date = #{request.targetDate}, is_completed = #{request.isCompleted}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM personal_todo WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY target_date ASC
